name: Knock Yourself Out!
description:
This game was made for the 2019 Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam. The theme was "Only One" so this is a fighting game with only one combatant.  The goal of the game is to get the character to punch himself in the face until he is knocked out before the time runs out.  The faster the fist is moving when it connects, the more damage it will do.  The more hurt you are the harder it is to punch.

Controller Required

Use the left and right joysticks to control each arm respectively.  Use the bumpers to punch.

The red bar indicates the characters health and the green bars are stamina for each arm.  When the green bar is filling the character cannot punch.
